Wind Power is given by the equation: 

P= 0.5 x œÅ x A x Cp x V3 x Ng x Nb 
 



A = Rotor swept area (m2). 
Cp = Coefficient of performance 

V = wind velocity (m/s) 

Ng = generator efficiency 

Nb = gear box bearing efficiency
